message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $8200. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from this product. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $7000. I really think this product would be a great fit for me, and I'm willing to negotiate further to make it work.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $7500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for you. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.
